import React from 'react' import './loginsignup.css' import { useState } from 'react'; import user from '../assets/user.jpg' ; import password from '../assets/password.png'; import mail from '../assets/mail.webp'; const Loginsignup = () => { const [action,setAction] = useState("Sign Up"); return (
{action}
Lost Password?? No worries CLICK HERE
Sign Up
Sign Up
) } export default Loginsignup;
